name: Nimgrab File Download
description: Detects usage of nimgrab, a tool bundled with the Nim programming framework, downloading a file. This can be normal behaviour on developer systems.
false_positives: Legitimate use of Nim on developer systems
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Nn][Ii][Mm][Gg][Rr][Aa][Bb]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR related.hash:(/.*[Mm][Dd]5\=2[Dd][Dd]44[Cc]3[Cc]29[Dd]667[Ff]5[Cc]0[Ee][Ff]5[Ff]9[Dd]7[Cc]7[Ff][Ff][Bb]8[Bb].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Hh][Aa]256\=[Ff]266609[Ee]91985[Ff]0[Ff][Ee]3[Ee]31[Cc]5[Ee]8[Ff][Aa][Ee][Ee][Ee][Cc]4[Ff][Ff][Aa]5[Ee]0322[Dd]8[Bb]6[Ff]15[Ff][Ee]69[Ff]4[Cc]5165[Bb]9559.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh]\=[Cc]07[Ff][Dd][Dd][Dd]21[Dd]123[Ee][Aa]9[Bb]3[Aa]08[Ee][Ee][Ff]44[Aa][Aa][Aa][Cc]45.*/) OR process.hash.md5:/2[Dd][Dd]44[Cc]3[Cc]29[Dd]667[Ff]5[Cc]0[Ee][Ff]5[Ff]9[Dd]7[Cc]7[Ff][Ff][Bb]8[Bb]/ OR process.hash.sha256:/[Ff]266609[Ee]91985[Ff]0[Ff][Ee]3[Ee]31[Cc]5[Ee]8[Ff][Aa][Ee][Ee][Ee][Cc]4[Ff][Ff][Aa]5[Ee]0322[Dd]8[Bb]6[Ff]15[Ff][Ee]69[Ff]4[Cc]5165[Bb]9559/ OR imphash:/[Cc]07[Ff][Dd][Dd][Dd]21[Dd]123[Ee][Aa]9[Bb]3[Aa]08[Ee][Ee][Ff]44[Aa][Aa][Aa][Cc]45/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\nimgrab.exe OR related.hash:(*MD5\=2DD44C3C29D667F5C0EF5F9D7C7FFB8B* OR *SHA256\=F266609E91985F0FE3E31C5E8FAEEEC4FFA5E0322D8B6F15FE69F4C5165B9559* OR *IMPHASH\=C07FDDD21D123EA9B3A08EEF44AAAC45*) OR process.hash.md5:2DD44C3C29D667F5C0EF5F9D7C7FFB8B OR process.hash.sha256:F266609E91985F0FE3E31C5E8FAEEEC4FFA5E0322D8B6F15FE69F4C5165B9559 OR imphash:C07FDDD21D123EA9B3A08EEF44AAAC45)`
